status.auth-command: Authentication is required to run this command as the super user.

settings.description: Connect to the Noctalia polkit agent over IPC.
settings.poll-interval-desc: How frequently the plugin checks for new authentication requests.
settings.auto-open-desc: Show the panel immediately when a request arrives.
settings.auto-close-success-desc: Close the panel after a successful authentication.
settings.show-success-animation-desc: Keep the dialog visible briefly after success.
settings.auto-close-cancel-desc: Close the panel when a request is cancelled.
settings.panel-mode-desc: Choose how the authentication dialog appears (may require reopening).
settings.sync-panel-mode-desc: Automatically use the same panel mode as the main shell settings.
settings.success-animation-duration-desc: How long the success state is shown before closing.
